theme: We are the Light of the World
topic: Letting the World Know Your Sand

contents.head: proposition
contents.content: to understand how to pray, we must understand the character, content, and circumstances of prayer,

contents.head: Objective
contents.content: Learn how to pray effectively both in poblic and in private,

contents.head: Aim
contents.content: to teach the basic content of prayer and to help those who are learning, to pray better

contents.head: Introduction
contents.content: beginning of lesson on prayer changes things- how to pray effectively],
1. Read Act 2:42 'and they continue steadfastly in the apostles doctrine and fellowship and in breaking of bread, and in prayers'
2. About the text
a. The Early church was a raying church
b. In Acts 4:24-31, we read regarding the power of prayer
c. How can we pray with the same frequency and effectiveness today?

contents.head: Discussion
contents.content: Discussion of lesson on prayer changes things - how to pray effectively

contents.head: The Character of Prayer - What is Prayer? 1 Timothy 2:1-3

contents.content: 1. Supplications
a. The greek word indicates an attitude of worship-litterally bending the knee
b. It was used i situation where petitions were made before Kings
1. Supplications
